\documentclass{standalone}

\usepackage{pstricks, pstricks-add}


\begin{document}
	
	
	
	\begin{pspicture}(-3, -3)(3,3)
	%\psgrid
	
    \psChart[userColor={green!50, blue!50, red!50}]{50, 33, 17}{}{2}
  
	\rput(psChartI1){\large{N}}
	\rput(psChartI2){\large{H}}
	\rput(psChartI3){\large{L}}
	
	
    \psdot*[dotstyle = triangle, dotangle = 180, dotscale = 2](0,2.4) 
	
	
	
	
	
	

	
		
	
	\end{pspicture}
	
	
\end{document}
